methods.name: AddActorToExcludeFromHitTests
GetHeadTransform
methods.doc: Gets the transform of the viewport / user's HMD in world space

methods.name: GetRoomSpaceHeadTransform
methods.doc: Gets the transform of the viewport / user's HMD in room space

methods.name: GetRoomTransform
methods.doc:
Gets the world space transform of the calibrated VR room origin.  When using a seated VR device, this will feel like the
      camera's world transform (before any HMD positional or rotation adjustments are applied.)

methods.name: GetTransformGizmoActor
methods.doc: Gets the transform gizmo actor, or returns null if we currently don't have one

methods.name: GetWorldScaleFactor
methods.doc: Gets the world scale factor, which can be multiplied by a scale vector to convert to room space

methods.name: RemoveInteractor
methods.doc: Removes interactor from the worldinteraction and removes the interactor from its paired interactor if any

methods.name: SetHeadTransform
methods.doc:
Sets a new transform for the room so that the HMD is aligned to the new transform.
              The Head is kept level to the ground and only rotated on the yaw
